description:
The investment seeks to provide investment results that, before fees and expenses, correspond generally to the total return performance of the S&P Capital Markets Select Industry Index.
 The fund generally invests substantially all, but at least 80%, of its total assets in the securities comprising the index. The index represents the capital markets segment of the S&P Total Market Index ("S&P TMI") and tracks the performance of publicly traded companies that do business as broker-dealers, asset managers, trust and custody banks or exchanges. The fund is non-diversified.
